description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Public Safety of Canada, have a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Montreal, Quebec between November and December 2024.

# Tender Notification

**Tender Title**: EF245-241843-2: Furniture Purchase under Supply Arrangement for Category 6

**Reference Number**: WS4451675136-Doc4546381282

**Notice Date**: April 19, 2024
**Closing Date and Time**: May 13, 2024, 2:00 PM ED T

**Contract Period**: April 19, 2025

## Tender Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to provide accommodation furniture, seating, and desking systems under supply
